chapter.text: 74|1|(Dai i ni) tsutsumiru mono yo,
74|2|tachinobotte keikoku shi nasai.
74|3|Anata no omo o tatae nasai.
74|4|Mata anata no i o seiketsu ni tamochi nasai.
74|5|Fujō o sake nasai.
74|6|Mikaeri o kitai shite hodokoshite wa naranai.
74|7|Anata no omo no (michi no) tame ni, taeshinobi nasai.
74|8|Rappa ga fuka reru toki,
74|9|sonohi wa kunan no hi.
74|10|Fushin-sha-tachi ni tori, yasuragi no nai (Ni~Tsudearu).
74|11|Ware ga tsukutta mono o, ware hitori ni makase nasai.
74|12|Ware wa, kare ni yutakana tomi o sazuke,
74|13|mata sono mawari ni, musuko-tachi o habera se,
74|14|kare no tame ni,(monogoto o) enman yōi ni shita.
74|15|Sore demo kare wa, ware ga sarani yutaka ni suru yō hosshita.
74|16|Danjite yurusa renai. Kare wa, waga shirushi ni taishi ganmeideatta.
74|17|Yagate ware wa, hidoi tsūku de kare o nayamasudearou.
74|18|Kare wa sō o neri, sakubō shita.
74|19|Kare wa horobirudearou. Nanto (akui o motte) kare-ra wa sakubō shita koto yo.
74|20|Kasanete iu. Kare wa horobirudearou. Nanto kare wa sakubō shita koto yo.
74|21|Sonotoki, kare wa chiratto (kuruān o) nagame,
74|22|Mayu o hisome, nigai kao o shite,
74|23|sorekara, kōman ni se o mukete satta.
74|24|Kare wa itta. `Kore wa mukashi kara no majutsu ni sugimasen.
74|25|Dō mite mo ningen no kotoba ni sugimasen.'
74|26|Yagate ware wa jigoku no hi de, kare o yakudearou.
74|27|Jigoku no hi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
74|28|Sore wa nanimono mo manukare sasezu, mata nanimono mo nokosanai.
74|29|Hito no hifu o, kuroku kogasu.
74|30|Sono-jō ni wa 19 (no tenshi ga kanshuru).

74|31|Ware ga gōka no kanshu to shite, tenshi-tachi no soto ni dare mo meijinakatta. Mata kare-ra no kazu o gentei shita koto wa, fushinjin no mono-tachi ni taisuru hitotsu no kokoromi ni suginai. (Sore ni yori) keiten o sadzuke rareta-sha-tachi o kakushin sa se, mata shinjiru mono no shinkō o fukameru tamedearu. Mata keiten o sadzuke rareta mono ya shinja-tachi ga, utagai o nokosazu, mata sono kokoro ni yamai no yadoru mono ya, fushin-sha-tachi ni,`arrā wa kono hiyu de, nani o o nozomi ni naru nodeshou ka.' To iwa seru tamedearu. Ko no yō ni arrā wa, o jibun no nozomi no mono o mayowa se, mata nozomi no mono o michibika reru. Soshite kare no soto dare mo anata no omo no gunzei o shiranai nodearu. Hontōni kore wa ningen ni taisuru kunkai nihokanaranai.
74|32|Iya, tsuki ni chikai kete,
74|33|dokou to suru, yoru ni chikai kete,
74|34|mata kagayakou to suru, akatsuki ni chikai kete (chikau).
74|35|Sore wa ōkina (shirushi no) hitotsudeari,
74|36|ningen e no keikoku.
74|37|Anata gata no naka, mae ni susumu koto o nozomu mono, mata ato ni nokoru koto o negau mono e no (keikokudearu).
74|38|Sorezore no tamashī wa, sono okonatta koto ni taishi,(arrā ni) tanpo o teikyō shite iru.
74|39|Migite no nakama wa betsudearu.
74|40|(Kare-ra wa) rakuen no naka ni ite, tagaini tazune audearou.
74|41|Tsumi o okashita-sha-tachi ni tsuite,
74|42|`nani ga, anata gata o rekka no naka ni michibiita nodesu ka.' To.
74|43|Kare-ra wa (kotaete) iu. `Watashi-tachi wa reihai o sasagete imasendeshita.
74|44|Watashi-tachi wa mata, hinja o yashinaimasendeshita.
74|45|Watashi-tachi wa kūron no to to tomoni muda-banashi ni fukeri,
74|46|tsuneni shinpan no hi o hitei shite imashita.
74|47|Tsuini shinjitsu ga, watashi-tachi ni tōrai shimashita.'
74|48|Sore de torinasu mono no torinashi mo, kare-ra ni yakudatanaidearou.
74|49|一体訓戒 Kara somuki saru to wa, kare-ra wa dō shita nodearou.
74|50|Kare-ra wa chōdo shishi o mite kyōfu ni ochītta roba no yō ni,
74|51|ichimokusan ni nigedasu ka no yōdeatta.
74|52|Iya, kare-ra wa sorezore aka reta shokan ga sadzuke rareru koto o nozonde iru.
74|53|Iya danjite sōde wanai. Kare-ra wa raise o osorete inai nodearu.
74|54|Iya, kore wa masani kunkaidearu.
74|55|Dakara dare demo hossuru mono ni wa, sore o kimo ni meiji sase nasai.
74|56|Daga, arrā ga nozoma reru mono no soto wa, ryūi shinaidearou. Kare wa kashiko rubeki okata yoku yurushite kudasa reru okatadearu.
